name: I18nt
tagline: angular translation module with custom filters for different languages
body:
i18nT ===== angular translation module with custom filters for different languages with support for different grammar cases Live example This is example of using i18nT 1. Directive
<p ng-bind="'MAIN.HELLO' | i18nT"></p>
2. Filter
<span>{{'POSTS.INFO' | i18nT:[{n:post}]}}</span>
<span>{{'POSTS.PERSON_POSTS' | i18nT:[{gender:'male',n:post,k:post-2,first:'Peter',second:'John'}]}}</span>
<span>{{'POSTS.PERSON_POSTS' | i18nT:[{gender:'female',n:post,k:post-2,first:'Anna',second:'Christine'}]}}</span>

3. In Controller
alert(i18nT('MAIN.HELLO'));
For more info see the "example" folder
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
